short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The goal of this tool is to speed development/testing along.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This tool allows for the modifying of one value in local storage. It can copy, paste, save, or modify the selected value via the dropdown menu. The value data is stored in the user profile data, which allows you to grab the data across tabs and even computers.

If you encounter any issues or want to request new features make an issue on GitHub. I'll answer as soon as possible!
